pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() ?  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() ? $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Unknown    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Herobrine$() is said to be $(thing)Notch's$() dead brother, somehow embedded into Minecraft. $(br2)He has bright white eyes that glow in the darkness, and is able to hold $(item)Tools$() and $(item)Weapons$() that deal massive damage.

pages.name: Herobrine Shrine
pages.text: Legends say that this shrine calls $(thing)Herobrine$().
